message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $80.
I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $90?
I'm getting close to walking away from the deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $100, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think we're getting close to the minimum I'm willing to accept. How about we meet at $105?
